CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 14 reads: "Brick Masons At Work On Belmar Gardens - Belmar Gardens, the 118-unit cooperative housing development in Twelfth Ward, is providing employment for some Negro skilled workers as the building progresses. At the top left, bricklayers, John Lapinski, Roc Lemanna, T.L. Foster, foreman Hany Valloni and Mariob Karnoski are shown...All the bricklayers are members of the Bricklayers International Union, Local No. 2-Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Bricklayers, including John Lapinski, Roc Lemanna, T.L. Foster, foreman Hany Valloni, and Mariob Karnoski, laying bricks atop cinder block foundation in Belmar Gardens
